appendix.title: Reporting Bugs and Requesting Enhancements
appendix.para: If you find a bug or miss a feature in GIMP, the developers would like to know about it so they can look into it.

tip.para: The procedure for making an enhancement request—that is, for asking the developers to add a missing feature—is the same as the procedure for reporting a bug.

appendix.para: Please also make sure that you are using the latest stable version of GIMP: reporting bugs that have already been fixed is just a waste of everybody's time.
